question: Which Hockey Academy has clinched the 115th All India Aga Khan Gold Cup hockey tournament 2018?
explanation: The Steel Authority of India (SAIL)â€™s Hockey Academy (SHA)  has clinched the 115th All India Aga Khan Gold Cup hockey tournament 2018 by defeating the Army XI Danapur in the final by 2-1 at Major Dhyan Chand Hockey Stadium in New Delhi. Aga Khan Gold Cup is one of the oldest hockey tournaments in the country.
